net.philsprojects.live
Interface ModuleListener<S>

Type Parameters:
S - The strategy type. This is typically an interface and each strategy holds its own implementation.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ModuleListenerAdapter
public interface ModuleListener<S>

A listener invoked when module activity has occurred. The listener is notified when a strategy swap has occurred, when an error has occurred during a strategy swap, when a strategy has been added, and when a strategy has been removed.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void onStrategyAdd(Module<S> module, Strategy<S> added)
          Invoked when a strategy has been added to a module.
 void onStrategyError(Module<S> module, Strategy<S> from, Strategy<S> to, java.lang.Exception e)
          Invoked when a module had errors swapping the active strategy.
 void onStrategyRemove(Module<S> module, Strategy<S> removed)
          Invoked when a strategy has been remove from a module.
 void onStrategySwap(Module<S> module, Strategy<S> from, Strategy<S> to)
          Invoked when a module has successfully swapped its active strategy with another strategy.
 

Method Detail

onStrategySwap

void onStrategySwap(Module<S> module,
                    Strategy<S> from,
                    Strategy<S> to)
Invoked when a module has successfully swapped its active strategy with another strategy.

Parameters:
module - The module the swap has occurred on.
from - The previously active strategy.
to - The new active strategy.

onStrategyError

void onStrategyError(Module<S> module,
                     Strategy<S> from,
                     Strategy<S> to,
                     java.lang.Exception e)
Invoked when a module had errors swapping the active strategy.

Parameters:
module - The module the swap failed to occur on.
from - The active strategy.
to - The strategy which failed to be swapped.
e - The exception thrown.

Invoked when a strategy has been added to a module.

Parameters:
module - The module the strategy has been added to.
added - The strategy added to the module.

onStrategyRemove

void onStrategyRemove(Module<S> module,
                      Strategy<S> removed)
Invoked when a strategy has been remove from a module.

Parameters:
module - The module the strategy has been removed from.
removed - The strategy removed from the module.
